QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, team_definitions.id odf_pk, team_definitions.CODE as code, team_definitions.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, odf_ca_teamdefinition.odf_period_end as odf_period_end, odf_ca_teamdefinition.odf_period_type as odf_period_type, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TEAM_DEF_ALLOCATIONS WHERE TEAM_DEF_ID = TEAM_DEFINITIONS.ID) as allocation_count, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, odf_ca_teamdefinition.odf_period_start as odf_period_start, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as last_updated_by, team_definitions.NAME as name, (CASE WHEN (SELECT PAC_MNT_RESOURCES.ID FROM PAC_MNT_RESOURCES, SRM_RESOURCES WHERE PAC_MNT_RESOURCES.ID = SRM_RESOURCES.ID AND SRM_RESOURCES.DEFINED_TEAM_ID = TEAM_DEFINITIONS.ID) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) as has_financials, TEAM_DEFINITIONS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, odf_ca_teamdefinition.partition_code as partition_code, TEAM_DEFINITIONS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, odf_ca_teamdefinition.odf_entity_code as odf_entity_code from team_definitions team_definitions JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=team_definitions.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=team_definitions.last_updated_by JOIN odf_ca_teamdefinition odf_ca_teamdefinition ON odf_ca_teamdefinition.id=team_definitions.id where 1 = 1
